scripts.c:c: docker compose exec php bin/console cache:clear
scripts.fixture: docker compose exec php bin/console doctrine:fixtures:load
scripts.make:command: docker compose exec php bin/console make:command
scripts.make:controller: docker compose exec php bin/console make:controller
scripts.make:entity: docker compose exec php bin/console make:entity
scripts.make:migrate: docker compose exec php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate
scripts.make:migration: docker compose exec php bin/console make:migration
scripts.make:migration:diff: docker compose exec php bin/console doctrine:migrations:diff
scripts.phpcs: docker compose exec php tools/php-cs-fixer/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer check src --using-cache=no
scripts.phpcsf: docker compose exec php tools/php-cs-fixer/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix src --using-cache=no
scripts.phpstan: docker compose exec php ./vendor/bin/phpstan analyse src -c .phpstan.neon
scripts.phpunit: docker compose exec php php bin/phpunit
